name: Mentoria
description: At Mentoria, we offer a holistic career discovery platform, helping students identify careers they'll enjoy and excel in, guiding them until their first job. Addressing critical issues like teenage depression and high student suicide rates, we use a scientific, psychometric-based approach to navigate the complex landscape of over 12,000 career paths, ensuring young individuals avoid dissatisfaction and thrive in their chosen fields.
Headline: Clutter to Clarity
ShortDescription: Enabling individuals to discover themselves and their ideal career paths

Highlights.name: Career Counselling
Highlights.description: Our team of talented and rigorously trained career counsellors will have a one-on-one career counselling session with you over a video call.

Highlights.name: College Recommendations for Foreign Admissions
Highlights.description: Get unbiased recommendations for international education based on your overseas study destination, budgets and preferred courses.

Highlights.name: CV Review and Interview Preparation
Highlights.description: Create the perfect resume and get guidance for job application strategy, interview preparation and more.

enhanced_description: Mentoria is a holistic career discovery platform designed to guide individuals from career identification through to their first job. It addresses critical issues like teenage depression and high student suicide rates by employing a scientific, psychometric-based approach to help users navigate over 12,000 career paths. The platform ensures young individuals find careers they will enjoy and excel in, promoting long-term satisfaction and success. Key services include one-on-one psychometric-based career counseling sessions via video call, unbiased college recommendations for foreign admissions (considering overseas study destination, budgets, and preferred courses), and comprehensive support for CV review, job application strategy, and interview preparation.
competitive_advantages: Holistic career guidance from discovery to first job
Scientific and psychometric-based career assessment approach
Extensive database of over 12,000 career paths
Focus on improving student well-being and reducing dissatisfaction
roi_benefits: Reduced career dissatisfaction and associated mental health issues
Enhanced success and thriving in chosen fields
Better-prepared individuals for the job market
